name.baseName: Egg production ; feed raw material production
鸡蛋生产 ; 饲料原料生产

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The lexical ingredients of laying hens are composed of corn, soyabeans, bran, stone powder, etc. According to the actual situation in Heilongjiang Province, corn accounts for 60%~66% of the lexical ingredients and soyabeans account for 20%~26% of the lexical ingredients. Due to the lack of relevant data on the production of bran and stone powder, only corn and soyabeans are considered in the composition of lexical ingredients in this paper. The production stage of word materials mainly includes the production stage of fertilizer, the planting stage of corn and soybean and the production stage of soybean meal.
蛋鸡的词料原料由玉米、 豆柏、 麸皮、 石粉等组成， 根据黑 龙 江省的实际情况， 玉米占 词料组成的60%~66% 豆柏占词料组成的20%~26% 又由于麸皮、 石粉生产的相关数据的 缺乏， 因此本文在词料原料组成上仅考虑玉米和豆柏。 词料原料生产阶段主要包括化肥的生 产阶段、 玉米和大豆的种植阶段和豆粕生产阶段。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The main output product of laying hens is eggs, so the functional unit defined in this study is "1kg egg".

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: The average single yield of maize and soybean in Heilongjiang Province in 2009 is from the Chinese Agricultural Yearbook.
黑龙江省玉米、大豆的在2009年的平均 单产量来自中国农业年鉴。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: Life cycle evaluation of intensive egg farm in Heilongjiang Province
黑龙江省集约化蛋鸡场的生命周期评价

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Quantitative method was used in this study. This evaluation includes a re-examination or revision of the objectives and scope of the research to determine how the objectives of the research can be met. According to the actual situation of layer production, the technical framework of life cycle impact assessment (FIG. Impact assessment includes four steps: classification, characterization, standardization and weighted assessment. (1) Classification: The input and output data in the life cycle inventory analysis were classified into different types of environmental impact. Based on the analysis results of the life cycle inventory of laying hens, the following four types of environmental impact were evaluated: global warming, environmental acidification, eutrophication and photochemical ozone synthesis. (2) Characterization: Quantitative inventory analysis of data to determine the degree of impact of four types of environmental impact. This makes the amount of environmental pollution that would otherwise not be comparable comparable. (3) Standardization: First of all, standardization benchmarks should be established to provide comparable standards for the relative sizes of the four environmental impact types of global warming, environmental acidification, eutrophication, and photochemical ozone synthesis. (4) Weighted assessment: is the process of grouping environmental impact into a unified indicator - environmental load size, so as to directly compare different production systems.

本研究采用定量方法。 这种评价包括对研究目标和范围的重新审查或修正， 从而决定如何才 能满足研究的目标。 依据 ， 结合蛋鸡生产的实际情况， 给出生命周期影响评价的技术框架（图 。 影响评价包括四个步骤分类、 特征化、 标 准 化、加权评估。 （1）分类： 将生命周期清单分析中输入输出数据分门别类的归纳到不同环境影响类型中， 针 对蛋鸡的生命周期清单分析结果， 本文分为以下四种环境影响类型进行评估： 全球变暖， 环境酸化， 富营养化， 光化学臭氧合成。 （2）特征化： 定量清单分析中的数据， 确定四种环境影响类型的影响程度。 这使本来不具可 比性的环境污染排放量具有可比性。 （3）标准化： 首先要建立标准化基准， 为全球变暖、 环境酸化、 富营养化、光化学臭氧合成 四种环境影响类型的相对大小提供可比较的标准。（4） 加权评估： 是将环境影响归为统一的指标 —环境负荷大小的过程， 从而直接对不同生 产系统进行对比。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The industrial process of egg production utilizes feed composed primarily of corn and soybeans. The feed mix is based on agricultural practices in Heilongjiang Province, where corn makes up 60% to 66% and soybeans 20% to 26% of the feed composition. This process is integral to the operation of intensive egg farms in the region, which are the primary source of eggs. The feedstock is produced through various stages including fertilizer production, cultivation of corn and soybean crops, and the production of soybean meal.
鸡蛋生产工艺使用的饲料主要由玉米和大豆组成。根据黑龙江省的农业实践，饲料混合中玉米占60%至66%，大豆占20%至26%。该过程是该地区集约化蛋鸡场运营的核心部分，是该地区主要的鸡蛋来源。饲料原料的生产包括多个阶段，如化肥生产、玉米和大豆作物的种植，以及大豆粕的生产。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: 本研究中玉米和大豆的种植期间化肥投入的相关数据取自高强等王伟等的资料， 基 本能代表目前黑龙江省玉米、大豆生产的实际情况。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 高雪. 黑龙江省集约化蛋鸡场的生命周期评价. (东北农业大学, 2012).
高雪. 黑龙江省集约化蛋鸡场的生命周期评价. (东北农业大学, 2012).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Data users should focus on the provided composition of feed when accounting for the environmental impacts of egg production. It should be noted that only corn and soybeans are considered in this dataset, due to the lack of data on other components such as bran and stone powder. The influence of fertilizer application during the growth of corn and soybean, as specifically practiced in Heilongjiang Province, should be included in the assessment. When assessing the environmental impact per functional unit, '1kg of eggs' should be used as the reference output. The data regarding crop yields and fertilizer usage is based on the situation in the year 2009 and sourced from the Chinese Agricultural Yearbook and relevant studies.
数据使用者在核算鸡蛋生产的环境影响时应关注提供的饲料组成。应当注意，由于缺乏关于麸皮和石粉等其他成分的数据，该数据集中仅考虑玉米和大豆。在评估过程中应包括黑龙江省特有的玉米和大豆生长期间化肥的使用影响。在评估每个功能单元的环境影响时，应使用'1kg鸡蛋'作为参考产出。关于作物产量和化肥使用量的数据基于2009年的情况，并来源于《中国农业年鉴》和相关研究。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 作为参考定量，非实际输出
